resources.string: What are the different types of bicycles available in your pilot run schemes?
What is the cost of renting a bicycle?
Are there any added benefits to the customer?
Is it possible to terminate the service midway?
Our vision is to have a fully automated app based bicycle sharing system. This system will streamline the entire process of taking a cycle and later returning it.
At For a geared cyclethe rent of the cycle is Rs 2200 and refundable deposit is Rs 3600. For a gearless cycle,the rent of the cycle is Rs 1200 and refundable deposit is Rs 2200 .
Yes, basic mechanical assistance will be provided to all cycles ,if rented from Wheels On Roll.
Due to the breach of contract ,the customer will not be refunded any part of the rent. The deposit will be given back to the customer after deducing charges for damages to the cycle if any.
